entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
